name: Hentai Arena | Battle Royale
description:
Hentai Arena | Battle Royale - is a shooting game, in which anime girls fighting each other for their lives.

Battle to become the last waifu standing on this apocalyptic island through tactical gun-play, an epic map, and physical shooting.

You need to kill as many enemies as possible to win.

Features:

  • 3 types of weapons
  • advanced AI enemies
  • limited map
